name: Firestorm: The Forest Fire Simulation Program
summary: Firestorm: Forest Fire Command is an educational simulation game that puts you in control of firefighting operations in the rugged Northwest. As the commander, you'll oversee 180,000 acres of diverse terrain, from mountains and forests to rivers and lakes. Strategically deploy four ground crews and two air tankers to combat up to five dynamic wildfires that spread based on wind and topography. Cut fire-lines, drop retardants, and make split-second decisions as you race against time and nature. With customizable settings for game speed, unit capabilities, and weather conditions, Firestorm offers a challenging and immersive experience that tests your strategic skills in the high-stakes world of wildfire management. Can you save the forest and nearby settlements from the relentless flames?
